Please feel free to reach out using the form below. BTW this is likely still dead. Will update you when it actually starts working :)

<form name="contact" method="POST" data-netlify="true" action="/success.html">
  
  <p>
    <label>Your Name: <input type="text" name="name" /></label>
  </p>
  
  <p>
    <label>Your Email: <input type="email" name="email" /></label>
  </p>
  
  <p>
    <label>Message: <textarea name="message" rows="5"></textarea></label>
  </p>
  
  <p>
    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Send Message</button>
  </p>

</form>
